original_text: Then you, the Lord's people, will sing! It will be like the happy songs that you sing in the evening at your special feasts. You will be very happy. It will seem like you are making music as you go up to Mount Zion to worship the Lord there. He is the Rock where Israel can be safe. Then you, the Lord's people, will sing! It will be like the happy songs that you sing in the evening at your special feasts. You will be very happy. It will seem like you are making music as you go up to Mount Zion to worship the Lord there. He is the Rock where Israel can be safe.
korean_text: 너희가 거룩한 절기를 지키는 밤에 하듯이 노래할 것이며 피리를 불며 여호와의 산으로 가서 이스라엘의 반석에게로 나아가는 자 같이 마음에 즐거워할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Then you, the Lord's people, will sing!
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 주의 백성인 너희가 노래하게 될 것이다!

sentences.original_text: It will be like the happy songs
that you sing in the evening
at your special feasts.
You will be very happy.
It will seem like you are making music
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 음악을 만드는 것처럼 보일 것이다

sentences.original_text: as you go up to Mount Zion
to worship the Lord there.
He is the Rock
where Israel can be safe.
Then you, the Lord's people, will sing!
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 주의 백성인 너희가 노래하게 될 것이다!

sentences.original_text: It will be like the happy songs
that you sing in the evening
at your special feasts.
You will be very happy.
It will seem like you are making music
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 음악을 만드는 것처럼 보일 것이다

sentences.original_text: as you go up to Mount Zion
to worship the Lord there.
He is the Rock
where Israel can be safe.
